name: Lollipop licking simulator 2: the revenge of the lollipop
name_original: Lollipop licking simulator 2: the revenge of the lollipop
description: This game takes place after the events of lollipop licking simulator. But this time, the lollipop doesn't want to get licked! So it fights back! Try to survive the battle! This lollipop will do anything it can do to destroy you! When it's shield runs out, that's your time to attack.
